# iru_tag (Resource)

Manages a Kandji Tag.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iru_tag" "example" {
  name = "terraform-managed"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the Tag.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier for the Tag.
